# Net Script

First python library to understand creating pip installable packages.

### File Structure

- netscript
  - __init__.py
  - __main__.py
  - __version__.py
  - cli.py
  - config.py
  - utils.py
  - requirements.txt
  - [app](netscript/app.py)


### Build steps

1. Navigate to the root directory of the project.
2. Local install
   1. pip install .
3. Pip install
   1. account information
